name: Lord Of Galactum
description:
Lord Of Galactum is a strategic spatial wargame 4X multiplayers and persistent universe.

You can :

- Colonize planets;

- Build industry to extract ressources;

- Build Shipyard to make ships;

- Make research;

- Design Ships with differents devices : you can put faster motor, or powerful shield, or evasion device, or laser, canon, plasma , missile...

- Make fleet and choose a captain;

- Explore the Universe, with 250.000 system;

- Extract ressources from asteroids;

- Capture planets from others players;

- Attack others fleets;

- Attack Pirates, Emperors, or trade with them if you have a good reputation;

- Block a region of the space;

- Enter in a corporation to have an advantage in attack, defend, travel, extract, research...

- Create an Alliance with others players.

 

A picture is better than a speech; take a look at the video,

and leave a comment if you like.

Dabouh
